title: Christmas Countdown Watch Face
description: Christmas Countdown Interactive Watch Face for Android WearDesign by Rebeca DudasNow you know exactly how many days, hours, minutes and seconds are until Christmas directly from your watch face. Also has an analog watch to know current time.With a simple tap the clock turns digital and the current date is displayedLet me know if you want to see anything else in interactive mode too.
descriptionHTML:
Christmas Countdown Interactive Watch Face for Android Wear
Design by Rebeca Dudas

Now you know exactly how many days, hours, minutes and seconds are until Christmas directly from your watch face.
Also has an analog watch to know current time.
With a simple tap the clock turns digital and the current date is displayed

Let me know if you want to see anything else in interactive mode too.
comments: Id love to use this - but says it's down loaded but it's no where to be found! Turned both device off and on etc. Isn't there!
So hard to read White text, light blue background, tiny font. Options, please.
Hate it It won't even let me open it
